name: ulcms
description: ULCMS: Rust core with WASM bindings (no env vars)

scripts.build-cheminfo: npm run tsc && cheminfo-build --entry lib-esm/index.js --root ULCMS && cp ../../artifacts/wasm/ulcms.wasm lib/ulcms.wasm
scripts.build: npm run tsc-esm && cp ../../artifacts/wasm/ulcms.wasm lib-esm/ulcms.wasm && cp ../../artifacts/wasm/ulcms.wasm lib/ulcms.wasm
scripts.test: npm run check-types && npm run eslint && npm run prettier && npm run test-only
scripts.tsc: npm run clean && npm run tsc-cjs && npm run tsc-esm
